siteMetadata.title: Blog by Dani Akash
siteMetadata.subtitle: I love Science & Technology. I work as a software engineer and specialize in building mobile apps with Javascript. I travel a lot, study science and nature of the Universe and I'm always ready for a nice conversation on Particle Physics.
